name: Howl's Moving Castle: The Scarecrow Prince
name_original: Howl's Moving Castle: The Scarecrow Prince
description:
The Scarecrow Prince is a co-op 3D game for 2 players.

Based on the movie "Howl's Moving Castle", the trans-media game's highlight its the numerous references to the animation of Studio Ghibli. the game player will know the incredible story of Turniphead origins, a charismatic character already known to fans of the film.
